patthana14.8:1.1: Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.8:2.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
